long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hannibal Lecter is a fictional character created by novelist Thomas Harris. Lecter is a serial killer who eats his victims. Before his capture, he was a respected forensic psychiatrist.
